meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ilium.
meanings.sent1: The ilial bone is connected to the spine.
meanings.sent2: Her ilial pain made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent3: The ilial muscles decided to take a break.
meanings.sent4: His ilial strength was as solid as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The ilial shape of the bone was unique and fascinating.

meanings.definition: Located in the region of the ilium.
meanings.sent1: The ilial nerves run along the hip area.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp ilial discomfort on her right side.
meanings.sent3: The ilial region was surprisingly cozy for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The ilial spot was as hidden as a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The ilial location of the injury was easy to pinpoint.

meanings.sent1: The ilial structure provides support for the body.
meanings.sent2: He had an ilial fracture after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The ilial bone threw a party for the other bones.
meanings.sent4: Her ilial connection to dance was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The ilial bone's importance in movement cannot be overstated.
